Instance.description: MultiSimPostureWithGenericObject was specifically created for Spooky WooHoo (Ghost Possession WooHoo). We have an interaction with two sims and an object, but the object is generic and can't provide a posture itself. Thus the interaction needs a posture and social group, like MultiSimSocialPosture; however, it still has a target (object). The posture also stores its own exit constraints for target and actor, instead of relying on containment slots, which are usually supplied by the (non-generic) object.

TunableEnum.name: generic_object_participant
TunableEnum.description: Specify the single participant from the owning super interaction that we will set as the AnimationParticipant.BASE_OBJECT.
